snippet: Infielder Nick Punto agreed to a one-year, $3 million contract with the Oakland Athletics after a little more than a season with the Los Angeles Dodgers.
abstract: Infielder Nick Punto agrees to one-year, $3 million contract with the Oakland Athletics after a little more than a season with the Los Angeles Dodgers; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Infielder Nick Punto agreed to a one-year, $3 million contract with the Oakland Athletics after a little more than a season with the Los Angeles Dodgers.
